author: boudoul
body:
- this is intended to synchronize 75X and 76X for runthematrix
- It includes the changes from @franzoni for run2 data + factorizing relval_step( MatrixUtil.py)
- It includes changes from @davidlange6 for unschedule (superseeding PR #10503 )
- It includes changes from @franzoni : removing miniaod step
- It removes the option magfield added by mistake by @srimanob

Some check should be further done with the baseDataSetRelease but testing already as it is now
the jsonfile2015 should also be fixed
title: Cleaning matrix75 x
